name: Tile Game
description:
GET THE HIGHEST PUNTUATION AND GET 2% OF TILE GAME EARNINGS

Welcome to Tile Game, the rules are simple, the screen will show 36 squares with a number of squares filled with # and another number of them empty. Select the square with the # you want to move introducing X and then Y, then select the direction you would like to move # (Up, Down, Right or left) if in the next square in the direction you selected theres an # and the next one is empty, the # will jumpt the first one eating the one in the middle.

Highest puntuation 2500.
